short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block all sites except what you allow. Restrict kids to the sites you allow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are a lot of website blockers, that will block websites that you specify, but what if you only want to let you child go on a few specific websites?
The Website Allower does just that!
Just enter what websites are allowed, and the rest are all blocked!

If you want to avoid it being changed, you can set a password by right-clicking on the extension and selecting options!
